result.reason: The application unexpectedly prompts for a password on new installs when leftover or incomplete SQL server configuration in the registry causes it to attempt an SQL connection without sufficient details.
result.approach: Modify OptRegistrySqlServerPage.cs to check if SQL Server usage is enabled via registry but essential connection parameters (host, database name, user) are missing or invalid. If so, default UseSQLServer to false to prevent the unexpected password prompt.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"The application unexpectedly prompts for a password on new installs when leftover or incomplete SQL server configuration in the registry causes it to attempt an SQL connection without sufficient details.","priority":"P2-bug","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Config/Settings/Registry/OptRegistrySqlServerPage.cs"],"approach":"Modify OptRegistrySqlServerPage.cs to check if SQL Server usage is enabled via registry but essential connection parameters (host, database name, user) are missing or invalid. If so, default UseSQLServer to false to prevent the unexpected password prompt."}
